required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Accuracy of Holladay 2 Formula in the Absence of Lens Thickness
clinical_study.official_title: Accuracy of Holladay 2 Formula Using IOLMaster Parameters in the Absence of Lens Thickness

brief_summary.textblock: Hypothesis: Holladay 2 formula is still accurate even used without lens thickness data.

clinical_study.study_design: Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Diagnostic

primary_outcome.measure: mean absolute error of Holladay2 formula
primary_outcome.description: IOLMaster version 5.4 was used to measure the patients' optical biometry by non contact technique.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Mean absolute errors, median absolute errors

intervention.description: IOLMaster version 5.4 was used to measure the patients' optical biometry by non contact technique.
intervention.arm_group_label: Mean absolute errors, median absolute errors

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- patients with cataract
Exclusion Criteria:
- previous ocular diseases
- previous ocular surgery

reference.citation: Narv√°ez J, Zimmerman G, Stulting RD, Chang DH. Accuracy of intraocular lens power prediction using the Hoffer Q, Holladay 1, Holladay 2, and SRK/T formulas. J Cataract Refract Surg. 2006 Dec;32(12):2050-3.
